titleStmt.title: Monophylo, Drawne into English by Geffray Fenton. A philosophicall discourse, and diuision of loue
Monophile. English
titleStmt.author: Pasquier, Etienne, 1529-1615.
Fenton, Geoffrey, Sir, 1539?-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Denham for William Seres],

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Pasquier, Etienne. Le Monophile.
Colophon reads "Imprinted at London by VVylliam Seres, dwelling at the west ende of Paules Church, at the signe of the Hedgehogge. Anno. 1572." Actual printer's name from STC.
The second book begins new foliation; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
